basic_info.description: Welcome to my portfolio. I am exited to get to work and ready to help make your dreams become my code. Some of the coding languages that are familiar to me are java, html, javascript, c++, c#, and python. Entering into coding has always been something I have wanted to do. Playing around with code since my high school day's making calculators and simple games. To making websites and apps that can help make peoples lives better.

projects.title: Rescue Express
projects.description: The cap stone project of my boot camp express. The group I was apart of worked to create this beautiful app that can be adapted to be used at an animal shelter to help get dogs adopted. We utilized mongo DB for the database then used css to create the cards for each dog. Finally used javascript to populate each card will info about each pet. There is even a way to submit an application for a fee of $10.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Simple weather app that lets the user search by city for the weather in that city. Utilizing the free weather api and javascript to make a simple design.

projects.title: Simple Calculator
projects.description: The first App I built out of my boot camp. This can be used to quickly enter prices to find the total. The sleek design is meant to make the App easy to use on the users phone.
